website_summaries.verdict: If you like the feel of sleeping on a jersey knit, these stretchy sheets are a solid bet.
pros: Warm in winter and cool in summer
A decent choice for foam mattress use
Stretches to fit over your mattress
cons: Sometimes jersey knit sheets can lose their shape over time

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not for deep mattresses
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are soft and I really like that they are 90% cotton (more cotton than some other brands). They are also thicker than my last set of jersey sheets from Target. However, the fitted sheet doesn't fully cover my 12" mattress. The description says it will cover up to 17" mattress, but given how difficult it was to pull the sheet over my 12", and how much gapping there is on the sides, I can't say that was my experience. If you have a 10" mattress they would be lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel van Spronsen

customer_reviews.title: 10% POLYESTER - returned!
customer_reviews.text: Full of stitching defects. Deceitful company listing this as “cotton” at the top of the details. Lower in the ad they cleverly state the sheets are 10% Polyester, 90% cotton in the the very bottom of the page. That’s is why people say they are rough and pill. Returned! AmazonBasics Jersey sheets are 100% cotton. Buy those.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyFeather

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable sheets
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for these sheets. They are super thin (you can see the print on my mattress through the sheets). Also, they are - for lack of a better word - scratchy. They aren’t soft and comfy like sheets should be. They feel like they have flecks of hard fiber throughout. I would not recommend this sheet purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are okay. My previous jersey knit sheets from another company were much softer and thicker. As for sizing, these sheets are slightly too small. The fitted sheet is very tight on the mattress, and my mattress isn't deep. These sheets also have tiny, hard flecks of tough, black thread scattered throughout the material, which is odd.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a huge fan of jersey knit sheets and after sampling many different brands, Great Bay Home is by far my favorite! The sheets are so incredibly soft and luxurious, it's the perfect addition to a good nights sleep! They are so light which is a huge plus for me because theres nothing worse than sleeping with a thick sheet that feels stiff. I'm really excited to order more sets in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn gulmi

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t honestly know why some customer reviews are bad... these are 90% cotton and 10% polyester. The Jersey sheets you find at Walmart that are soft for $20 are great but these are a tiny bit thickecker not to thick. And they are amazing... I love these sheets and I will purchase another pair when this set gets worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Crappy sheets for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Such a huge waste of money!!! Constantly coming off because they don’t go down low enough on the sides of the mattress. After a few washes, the color turned to a nasty brown color and it got little lint balls on it that make it feel like you have crumbs in your bed! So upset we wasted so much money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get your hopes up.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t exactly find Jersey knit king sheets anywhere else so you don’t really have a choice. Walmart’s are much thicker for our kids smaller beds and hold up forever. These didn’t survive 2 washes. Stitching coming out and all. And package was bent to crap. Can’t exactly return them now but wish I’d be known sooner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genuine 80% Cotten T-shirt Jersey fabric
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect 80% Cotton feel, I love it, the pillow cases are a bit larger so you can stuff giant fluffy pillows into them. I prefer a flater pillow for stomach sleeping, so it's a tad big, but I still love it! This was my second purchase, my first purchase didn't list 90% Polyester, they felt like athletic sweat absorbing undershirts, I immediately returned them and ordered these. It's harder to find cotten jersey style bed linen, my life is now complete at bed time! Don't make my mistake, order these if you love a t-shirt cotton jersey feel!
customer_reviews.author: RJ Cormack

customer_reviews.title: Bruh
customer_reviews.text: So awesomely soft, got king, fits perfectly on our king bed, plus the fabric tends to keep the imprint of whatever you put on it, so my 31 year old boyfriend really loves smashing his face into it and showing me the imprint, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite jersey sheets yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of Jersey sheets, and I won't sleep on anything else now! This brand is better quality than the last ones I got here on Amazon and I picked them because they have a stripe.... tired of ugly gray sheets, and these are much cheerier. They seem thicker. I washed them first, and they didn't twist up like my last ones did. They held their shape very nicely, yay! A weird bonus is that they have a stripe, which means no more turning them side to side every time I make the bed! Impressed. Will re-order
customer_reviews.author: 0susanna

customer_reviews.title: Piles quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say that these are piling after 3 weeks of use, 1 wash and dry as instructed. I love jersey knit sheets, they are so soft and breathable but I have yet to find some that don’t pile prematurely. (Little balls on the sheets) I was hoping that by spending a little extra $ on these that they would last longer than my target ones, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Anslee

customer_reviews.title: Sized incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: The king sheet set doesn't fit a king bed. Stuck with them because I washed them and put them on. I'll stick with my much softer pure beech sheets from bed bath and beyond that actually fit. Thought these might be comparable. NOT AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Blend is 60/40! :(
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the pillowcases. I ordered extra to match the sheet set that I still have not received yet. These pillowcases are not 90/10 or even 80/20 cotton-polyester. They are 60/40 cotton polyester which will make them rougher and not as cool as a higher cotton blend. VERY DISAPPOINTED and feel like this was false advertising. I will be returning them and most likely the sheet set if it is the same scenario.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite sheet material
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try jersey knit sheets being very disappointed with a cheap microfiber sheet purchase. These sheets were about the same price, so I didn’t expect much. However, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these. If you usually get hot at night, then these probably aren’t the sheets for you. I would compare them to the softness of flannel but with a bit more breathability, pretty much just like a well worn t-shirt. Plus, the simple neutral stripes look super cute folded over my comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 disappointment, pocket depth
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with softness and breathability. Gave 4 stars only because it says fits up to 17" mattresses. Mine is 12" with a 2" topper, it isn't as snug as I would like it to be. It hasn't pulled up but we have small dogs that sleep with us and some restless nights that make staying in place hard on any sheets. Matter of fact it's my only disappointment. I wish they would make an extra deep pocket up to 22" for the less than typical mattress. I have found 1 place that makes them but the fabric definitely isn't a great a quality as these. Would give 5 stars if depth was what it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sheets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best sheets ever!!! I love Jersey Knit sheets and when we got our new California King mattress it was impossible to find sheets that we liked. First time we slept on these we loved them. They are very durable as we have washed them like 4-5 times. I'm definitely going to purchase another set for back up
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Average, at best
customer_reviews.text: I've had jersey knit sheets before and these are nowhere near as soft or comfortable. I wouldn't call the surface rough, but definitely not cozy. They are on the thin side and, after only 3 months use, the surface is starting to pill. I didn't run into the corner pocket issue experienced by others. Did not dislike enough to return, but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Jazzy One

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new pillow that is a standard size BUT it is solid foam. Very comfy BUT too large for all of my standard pillowcases. When I saw these during my search on Amazon I decided to give them a try. They are beyond my expectations. Washed well, fit well. look great and are so comfortable. This will now be my go to for pillowcases.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I has a set for my room, and I got one for my boyfriends. He immediately fell in love too! They're so nice and they stretch out so there are no wrinkles on the bed which is just kind of nice in itself. When was he last time you made a bed and didn't have a single wrinkle? Pretty cool. The color was spot on too. Overall, I'd buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. These sheets are so thin I can see my mattress through them. Complete waste of money, even for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These sheets do not fit my average-sized queen mattress (60" x 80" x 11"). While the manufacturer claims that the fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 17-inches deep, there is a gap between the bottom of the fitted sheet and the bottom of the 11-inch deep mattress. The fitted sheet only fits correctly along the head/foot and corners of the bed. The flat sheet is also smaller than advertised and measures just 84" x 92" after being washed according to the manufacturer's directions.
customer_reviews.author: C Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Affordable soft sheets
customer_reviews.text: We love to get these because they are so soft and affordable. After washing, they remain soft and comfy. We don't get hot in them and can use them all year round. This is our second set we've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: It is like a T-Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t understand what it meant when looking for navy stripes when it said T-Shirt like. But I do now. It’s not my style and even though they are nice and soft it’s not what I wanted. I won’t be returning them as I’ll use them as spares. I still will rate them as four Stars because they are very comfortable and soft. Four Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: If I wanted darned sheets...
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, I put them directly into the wash, so it wasn't until I made the bed that I found a spot in the middle of the top sheet that had been clumsily repaired, leaving a raised, sewn lump...spoiling what should have been a soft smooth surface. I've learned my lesson. I will not trust the seller in the future and will examine the sheets before washing to make sure I've actually received a NEW product, and not one that has been repaired and most likely resold. I'm not impressed with your worker's sewing skills at all, Great Bay.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen O'Dale

customer_reviews.title: completely pilled
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with the color and the initial softness of these sheets. I washed them when they arrived and slept on them for a few nights. My naughty dog jumped on the bed after a muddy spring walk and I washed them a second time about three days after receiving them. After the second wash the fitted sheet is completely pilled and now it feels like laying in a bed full of sand. So one week in, $40 down the drain, and I'm shopping for sheets again. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND OR BUY AGAIN. POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Sicard Dorris

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate description. Feels like a comfy t shirt. I like warmer sheets so these are perfect for me. They are a little too warm for my husband but he likes them since he doesn't need to use the comforter. They're soft, warm, and the neutral colors go well with a lot of different comforts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the negative reviews before purchasing, because they were correct. If you really want soft jersey sheets, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Not very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I've felt worse, but these sheets aren't very soft, even after washing. Definitely doesn't feel like a T-Shirt I'd actually want to wear. Disappointing, but can't return then now that they've been washed. I probably should have tried to find 100% cotton. These are 80/20.
customer_reviews.author: GoPack7

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, deep pockets, breathable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets! Soft, comfortable, and they fit my mattress with a 3in foam topper. Definitely recommend and will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soft Heather pink. I got king size and we have a deeper but not super deep mattress and this had so much extra room I checked to make sure I didn't get a call king on accident. I was able to tuck it so it's not noticeable but beware it might be big on your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gifford

customer_reviews.title: You will love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets! I purchased the twin size. The fitted sheet isn’t quite deep enough for my extra thick mattress but it stays in place throughout the night. My bed is soft and comfortable and so nice to get into at the end of a long day.
customer_reviews.author: September MorneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: It's supper soft.its like an old band tee shirt. Mine didn't come with a weird smell but I still washed it and it didn't loose its softness. It fits over a pillow top that's about 1.5 inches but there is still room.
customer_reviews.author: sarah brandom

customer_reviews.title: Where are the pillowcases???
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with the first sheet set I ordered, but this second one (gray) came without the 2 king sized pillowcases it's supposed to come with. I mean, they're soft sheets but it would be nice if the sets came complete consistently.
customer_reviews.author: shucky

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm....nothing about these are soft or Jersey. So disappointed. They feel like sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: Nemanja Lazic

customer_reviews.title: Hole in fitted sheet on arrival 😢
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed because there was a hole the size of a dime in fitted sheet. Can not send back for a replacement because this is my only set. I got a new bed last week so that’s why this is my only set.. Otherwise love the color, softness & feel of these Jersey sheets.... 💁🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Denice Vest

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Absolutely love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Absolutely love these sheets. They are SO soft and SO comfortable - they also wash extremely well! We have been looking for great Jersey Knit Sheets for some time and these have fulfilled everything we were looking for! Very happy with this purchase - even considering additional colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASH WELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in April, I bought a set for myself and two sons. They seemed great at first, really soft, but don’t last long, within 4 months of usual once a week washing all 3 sets are covered in tiny scratchy balls. Usually with Jersey sheets the more you wash them the softer they get like a worn out t-shirt! Not these. NEVER buying from this company AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Got tiny holes after being washed once
customer_reviews.text: The product is super soft as i expected and feels super comfortable so I like that, what i don’t like is that I washed them before i put them on my bed and there is tiny holes in two spots already that i noticed I just figured at this price point they would of held up better than that especially only being washed on a delicate cycle and then hung to dry
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Ordered these for my daughter and they came with a huge stain right in the box. There was also dirt all over these they are disgusting. Can’t believe they even sent me these sheets like this!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Leskanic

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sad to find a hole and black marks on the sheet once I put it on my bed to see if it fit. And sheets were not as soft as I thought they'd be. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but small!
customer_reviews.text: I got these sheets for my queen size bed and they have a faint plastic smell even after washing and drying-enough to make my room smell strange after being gone all day. I put the sheets on before washing to make sure they fit and they did, but after a single wash they BARELY fit my bed. I think they're pretty soft and comfortable, but can definitely see where some people are saying they are scratchy. Worth it for the price though, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: We love the way these sheets fit our new bed, they seem to stay on and stay tucked in better than our other sheets. They feel warmer when we crawl in bed at night but aren’t to warm. Over all great sheets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve E.

customer_reviews.title: Very scratchy and hot
customer_reviews.text: I had these for a month now. They are not really soft and are really scratchy. My body kept itching and felt hot as well. I bought this set for my Purple mattress to find a cheaper alternative to the Purple sheets. Although they did fit very well and are stretchy, they are not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen1337

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Jersey Knit sheets!
customer_reviews.text: We love jersey knit and always caution buying new ones from a new vendor but we LOVE these sheets! Comfortable, fit our Cali King very well (not to short on the sides)! The gray colors is not to dark but not to light either, just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMcSprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves jersey sheets. Keeps you cozy and it won’t make you perspire. Nice to lay on when the weather is warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Texture and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a California king bed, it’s hard to find good quality sheets that fit. I must say these sheets fit excellent. However I don’t can’t for how they feel. It’s not a bad texture but not a comfortable one. They claim to be Jersey T-shirt sheets but they don’t feel like cotton. Over all though good sheets. I’m just happy I found sheets that fit our bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like that I didn’t have to try very hard to find a duvet cover that matched. They are soft but not as soft as I expected from previous experiences with jersey knit sheets. Can’t complain though, they are still very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Qwencia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! First set of jersey sheets I’ve ever had that got rough and balled up. 2 washes is all it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Why Didn’t I Buy These Years Ago??
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so sublimely comfortable, I continually wonder why it took me so long to buy them. They’re so soft and breathable. Definitely one of the better purchase decisions I’ve made all year!
customer_reviews.author: P. Yates

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: having tried several brands of Jersey knit sheets and found most too thin or too strethie this is the perfect brand ...thick enough and very soft fits perfectly on my huge bed....so happy
customer_reviews.author: DR MOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Still being new and 1st wash prior to use--doesn't show any breakdown as yet (such as stretched out). Will need to get back later in the year. Otherwise--you produced way softer and cozier then ones I purchased years ago when this material for bedroom sheets first came out. Yummy nights
customer_reviews.author: KidZelda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not soft
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were not as soft as I like. Yes they are cotton but they feel like the cheap Jersey sheets you can get from Target for like 20 bucks. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for adjustable beds
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I just purchased an adjustable bed and the cotton sheets that I had were binding the mattress so I needed to purchase jersey style sheets that are more flexible when the bed raises. I will be purchasing another set soon.
customer_reviews.author: Maryfrances Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new Tuft & Needle queen perfectly, and so comfortable to sleep on. We've been sleeping on this set for about a week and the fitted sheet is still taut on the mattress-- no annoying lumps or wrinkles under my legs!
customer_reviews.author: Gilded Lily

customer_reviews.title: Best.  Sheets.  Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Forget all that million thread count bs! These jersey sheets are where it's at! My 12 year old son loves them! He has sensory issues and is super sensitive if something feels "scratchy" or "itchy". These are very well made without too much thickness. They keep you both warm and cool, if that makes any sense. They feel like being wrapped in your most comfortable t-shirt. For us, that's a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Purple Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The product fits our California King Size Purple Mattress perfect. We were not told about using stretchy sheets when we bought our Purple Mattress, but I read about it online. We bought these for half the price of Purple Mattress sheets, and they are great. Now we are getting the full benefit of our mattress purchase. The sheets are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep pocket
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sheets ever! So soft and comfy! Great for tall mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pilling!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Other than being comfortable sheets before the 2nd wash these were great! Cozy, soft, felt great. But 2 washes later and the pilling has begun. Im not sure why these would start doing such a terrible thing, but now itbis scratchy, not as soft as it used to be and losing its color.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Best material for a memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the only material that works with memory foam because it stretches with the foam and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: William Brunt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are horrible. They pill after a month and it feels like your sleeping on sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This actually fits our king size bed with extra room to add a memory foam mattress pad if we wanted too! ****it did not shrink after the first wash! I was afraid it would be the ones from target and Walmart that shrink after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a couple months now and they’re still great! They’re super soft and I think they’ve gotten softer since I washed them. I love that the stripes are a little something different than plain sheets. They do pill a little on the fitted sheet but I find that it’s hidden so I’m not too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Jersey is the best and softest sheet cotton weave possible - forget high thread counts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the warmer nights, so soft. Breathes very well. Those other high thread count sheets feel soft to the tough, but don't breathe. Your skin needs air!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable, but very poorly sewn
customer_reviews.text: The fabric feels really nice and it fits well on the bed, but the sewing is just completely garbage. The pillow case, and everything, is sewn so crooked that the seam goes diagonally across the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft at first, but starts to pill quickly and loses its softness
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these sheets when I first put them on the bed, they were super soft. Unfortunately, after the first wash, the fitted sheet began to pill where we slept making it uncomfortable and unattractive to look at. I've owned jersey sheets from Target that have lasted years without pilling, and am disappointed that these couldn't hold up for at least a year (or at a minimum at least one wash!). Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: After one wash, they had a huge snag in the middle. Not worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Couch Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a one night stand.....
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it besides the fact that one of the pillowcase is “off”, what should of been discarded was passed through quality control and packaged up for sale. Now I have only one pillowcase for my set while the other one is a cleaning rag bc someone doesn’t know how to sew.
customer_reviews.author: ehhh

customer_reviews.title: Great for my electric bed.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for electric adjustable bed. Woven sheets would slip off the corners when I elevated the head of my bed. Theses fit perfectly and have sturdy elastic all the way around the bottom of the fitted sheet. Totally solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Best t-shirt sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are better than your average jersey sheets, heftier, but just as soft. They look good; they feel good. This was my second set.
customer_reviews.author: JayB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great value for the money. We've always had issues with the edges popping up and these are wonderful because they are deep enough to fully cover our king bed and mattress cover. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Xanthouspdx

customer_reviews.title: Different sized pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: Sheets seem pretty good quality. My pillow cases are different sizes for some reason. But other then that, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Riches

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These brightly colored sheets are a restful shade of pink. They fit my deep mattress well and are very comfortable to sleep in. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the softness of these sheets. They are sized so the fitted sheet is extra wide which makes it easier to put on the bed and for it to stay on. The price was very great and they are so nice looking that I leave my down blanket down enough to reveal the pillows. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Annette F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets to replace the insanely expensive Purple sheets which are amazing with the Purple mattress. I was excited to find a sheet that was stretchy and had a lot of great reviews. The first clue something was wrong was the line on the pillows are vertical and the sheets are horizontal. Then after the third wash the fitted sheet was piling up so bad it felt like sand paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I just received these on Sunday. Washed them and put them on my pillow last night. They are soft and comfortable. It was a warmer night, but I did not get sweaty like I do with some other cases (pillow also plays a role in that). I like them and they are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lygia Medina

customer_reviews.title: VERY THIN SHEETS
customer_reviews.text: These Jersey sheets feel ok, for good on my 10 Inch memory foam mattress BUT they are so thin I could see thru them
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets except the fitted sheet just isnt deep enough for bed my mattress is huge. Also flat sheet should be wider. Other then that I love them. I would love it if I could get a fitted sheet that would fit. Id buy more sets. But Im scared it wont fit. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: pamela watson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Seem pretty durable. The price is amazing as well. Will be purchasing more down the line.
customer_reviews.author: SADIELADY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice!
customer_reviews.text: These have it all! Soft, comfortable, keeps you at the correct temp. Not too hot or cold. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zin4kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love jersey sheets, and these did not disappoint! Pretty color w/many to choose from! Super soft and they fit my Sleep Number mattress just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Jersey Knit Bed Sheets. They fit deep pocket mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: My Bed. The sheets are so soft to the touch. They fit my bed perfectly. I like the first set I bought, so I bought the second set.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite new sheets
customer_reviews.text: such a pretty color, soooo soft, and everything I want in a sheet set. I'm glad I got these.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a comfortable nights sleep!😃
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very comfortable. Great sheet to use in between flannel sheets and summer sheets. I like the fact they are made with cotton/polyester so they don't shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Calls4u

customer_reviews.title: These are really great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...pleasantly surprised! Very cozy and comfortable....with the right amount of stretch. Easy to care for. Exactly as I hoped they would be!
customer_reviews.author: TallJuls

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bed sheets I’ve ever had I don’t even care if they wear down early bc they are jersey material. I have bought soooo many different sheets online , at bed stores! none compare to the softness ! It also fits with out corners coming up on my California king !!! I personally love them .

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic

customer_reviews.text: Would buy these again for sure, love the sheets and held up nicely after the first wash. So far so good.

customer_reviews.text: Good value. Good sheets. Not super thin and look nice! Would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my 10" mattress.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit perfectly on my 10" mattress. They are soft and smooth. I'm enjoying mine.
customer_reviews.author: Badass

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough to completely cover the sides of the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed enough fabric to cover the memory foam mattress without being tight. The looseness is needed so the memory foam can do its thing. These sheets are too small and tight. Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kella Boatner

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan of polyester but this blend is quite comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: None of the plastic feel of most manmade knits. Bought one set to check them out and now I'm ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are exactly what I have been looking for. I definitely will purchase them again. They have great stretchability.
customer_reviews.author: Marie P.

customer_reviews.title: Stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy sheets, will be good for winter if we use them. They are pretty stiff even after washing them to soften them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fav!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of jersey type sheets. They’re like a worn T-shirt. It has the softness of flannel but doesn’t keep you warm like flannel. Save the flannel for winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sheets
customer_reviews.text: They are soft and wash wonderful. I love the fabric and the king size fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Darlene D.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: Lint is accumulating on the sheets making them feel rough and uncomfortable. These sheets are too expensive to be so cheap, bought them on 9/4/20 and I am ready to throw them away. I have contacted the manufacture to see what they can do. Stay put
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jersey Knit Sheets. All Season, Soft, Cozy XL Twin Jersey Sheets. T-Shirt Sheets. Jersey Cotton Sheets. Heather Cotton Jersey Bed Sheet Set. (Twin Extra Long, Green)
product_meta.description:
Size:Twin XL| Color:GreenExtra Soft Heather Jersey Knit Sheet Set
Wouldn’t you love an entire sheet set made out of your favorite t-shirt? Our extra soft and cozy jersey knit sheets are just what you need! These lightweight, flexible, breathable sheets are ideal for any season, so you can sleep comfortably in them year round. They make a perfect gift for birthdays, weddings, Christmas, holidays and more. 

Benefits
- 80% cotton, 20% polyester - feels just like your favorite t-shirt! 
- 150 GSM fabric is suitable for all seasons. Stay warm and cozy without getting too hot.
- Soft, flexible and breathable for maximum sleep comfort 
- Deep pockets to fit mattresses up to 17 inches deep
- Affordable prices that fit any budget, without sacrificing quality
- Beautiful colors to complement any décor

Perfect Fit Sizes
- Twin: 1 Fitted Sheet 39 inches x 75 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 66 inches x 96 inches, 1 Pillowcase 20 inches x 30 inches
- Twin XL: 1 Fitted Sheet 39 inches x 80 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 66 inches x 96 inches, 1 Pillowcase 20 inches x 30 inches
- Full: 1 Fitted Sheet 54 inches x 75 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 81 inches x 96 inches, 2 Pillowcases 20 inches x 30 inches
- Queen: 1 Fitted Sheet 60 inches x 80 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 90 inches x 102 inches, 2 Pillowcases 20 inches x 30 inches
- King: 1 Fitted Sheet 78 inches x 80 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 108 inches x 102 inches, 2 Pillowcases 20 inches x 40 inches
- Cal King: 1 Fitted Sheet 78 inches x 84 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 108 inches x 102 inches, 2 Pillowcases 20 inches x 40 inches

Easy Care
Machine washable, durable and long lasting. They just get better with every wash!

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!
If you don’t absolutely love these sheets, return them within 30 days for a full refund. We’ll work with you to resolve any issue and ensure that you’re satisfied with your experience.
feature_bullets: Extra Soft and Cozy: These jersey knit sheets feel just like your favorite t-shirt. The 80% Cotton, 20% Polyester fabric is warm, soft, flexible, and breathable for maximum sleep comfort.
Each set comes with 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet and 1 pillowcase. Choose from a variety of beautiful solid heathered colors.
All-Season Comfort: 180 GSM fabric is perfect for any time of the year. Lightweight enough for the summer, and cozy enough for the winter. EASY CARE: Machine washable, long-lasting and durable.

Perfect Fit Every Time: 1 Fitted Sheet 39 inches x 80 inches, 1 Flat Sheet 66 inches x 96 inches, 1 Pillowcase 20 inches x 30 inches. These DEEP POCKET sheets fit mattresses up to 17 inches deep, with a fully elasticized fitted sheet.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed: Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us. We’re confident you’ll love our products, but if you’re not 100% SATISFIED, our customer service team will work with you to make it right!
